bioconda.name: bioconductor-ropls
bioconda.summary: PCA, PLS(-DA) and OPLS(-DA) for multivariate analysis and feature selection of omics data

biotools.summary: The package includes methods for variable modeling as PCA or PLS, that can be useful for visualization, regression, classification, and feature selection of omics data where the number of variables exceeds the number of samples and with multicollinearity among variables. Orthogonal Partial Least Squares (OPLS) also enables to separately model the variation correlated (predictive) to the factor of interest and the uncorrelated (orthogonal) variation.
